Package com.diploma.black_fox_ex.service

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
com.diploma.black_fox_ex.service.UserService
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
@Service public class UserService extends Object implements org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
This class performs basic actions on received user interaction requests.
